rewrite1:

rewrite2:
In the tenth paragraph: please update the background highlight to the color with the hex value #0000FF. Also, apply the 'word underline' style for emphasis.

Regarding the seventh paragraph: remove any bold formatting currently applied to the text. Adjust the first line indent to 12 points for a neater appearance. Alter the font color to the light goldenrod yellow with the hex code #FAFAD2, and finish by adding a 'Wave Double' underline for a touch of flair.
rewrite3:
Please proceed with the following formatting updates to the Word document:

In the tenth paragraph, please alter the background shading to the color represented by the hexadecimal code #0000FF. Additionally, apply an underline to each word within this paragraph.

Turning to the seventh paragraph, the text should be changed from bold to regular font. Adjust the indentation of the first line to 12 points. The font color requires updating to the hexadecimal color #FAFAD2. Finally, embellish this paragraph's text with a 'Wave Double' style underline.
